channel.title: What about Nyx?
channel.description:
Hello guys,
Question about tor-arm. Why we are not using [Nyx](https://nyx.torproject.org/) (next version of Tor-Arm)? Arm since version 2.x is called Nyx and from that version few updates was made ([changelog](https://nyx.torproject.org/changelog/index.html)). Maybe it's worth to replace arm with nyx.

item.title: What about Nyx?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
nyx replaces in arm in Whonix 15 but don’t expect too much: just the project name changed, it still looks pretty much the same.

Read full topic

item.title: What about Nyx?
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Nyx 2.1.0-2 is available in buster, so can we finally get rid of this Arm crap in Whonix 15?

https://packages.debian.org/source/testing/nyx

Arm’s presentation makes one feel like the Amiga 500 is playing up again due to the common screen corruption

Read full topic

item.title: What about Nyx?
item.dc:creator: hoek
item.description:
Thanks guys. I hope they add it soon.

Read full topic

item.title: What about Nyx?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Same project.

old name: tor-arm
new name: nyx

So migration will come sooner or later.

Read full topic

item.title: What about Nyx?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi hoek

Nyx is not available in Debian stretch. (Whonix 14 is based on stretch)

  • https://packages.debian.org/stretch/tor-arm
  • https://tracker.debian.org/pkg/nyx

Related:

  • https://whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software#Prefer_APT

  • https://whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software#Avoid_Manual_Software_Installation

Read full topic
